snippet.title: Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game - PS3/X360/Wii/NDS/N3DS/Wii U - Jack and the Guardians
snippet.description:
This Holiday, the Guardians will rise to protect us all from an evil spirit named Pitch in  Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game.
Join forces with the Legendary Guardians as you and your friends become heroes and unleash powers greater than you ever imagined.

Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game will be available on the 23rd of November on Playstation© 3, Xbox© 360, Wii, Wii U, Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS.
For more information, please visit your local Namco Bandai website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
